subject: Pedals not recognised
description_text:
Hello Simsonn support, 
So ive just received my plus x pedals. I‘ve set them up in the software and the inputs are received there. But when i try to set them up in Assetto corsa competizione, the pedals arent recognized by the game when trying to map the inputs. 
I hope you can help me out because i couldnt really find anything online. 
With kind regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Jonathan Läsker,    Have you completed the calibration? In the software, can you see that all three pedals respond correctly and reach 100% during testing? If the game cannot detect them, please provide screenshots of the software interface and the in-game issue. Normally, ACC is fully compatible and should recognize and work with our pedal set without any problems.
